attributes.action: We want Parliament to commission an independent review of the election result...
attributes.additional_details: One minute the BBC TV media were stating that it was neck and neck between Labour and the Tory's, the next minute the Tory's were zooming ahead.  That cannot be right ?
attributes.background:
We are convinced the general election was rigged.

But rigged or not, the election was won on misinformation. And it needs to be sorted.
